casebody.data:
CAPPS
v.
NW SIGN INDUSTRIES et al. No. 383A05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 27, 2007. Jared E. Gardner, Richard B. Fennell, Charlotte, for Alan Capps.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2007 by Defendants for extension of time to file response to motion to dismiss:

"Motion Dismissed. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of December 2007."
